description:
A newspaper editor who needs protection confides to Ryo that she`s actually Kaori`s older sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 20 Nenme no Saiaki! Saeba-san Imouto o Yoroshiku (Zenpen)
20年目の再会! 冴羽さん妹をよろしく (前編)
Reunion After Twenty Years! Please Look After My Sister, Mr. Saeba (Part 1)
